Steam (ST): Rosa coughed violently. And the bright red that stained her face made it look as though she had coughed up blood.
Umineko Project (UP): Rosa coughed violently. And the bright red that stained her face made it look as though she had coughed up blood.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座は咽て咳き込みます。そして口の周りを真っ赤に汚すその様は、まるで血を吐いたかのようでした。
Russian (RU): Роза сильно закашляла. И вся яркая краснота, которая замарала ей лицо, создавала впечатление, будто она кашляла кровью.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rosa tossiu violentamente. E o vermelho intenso que manchava sua face fez com que parecesse que ela havia tossido sangue.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 樓座嗆得不停咳嗽。她嘴邊遍佈紅色污跡的樣子，簡直就像是吐過血似的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 楼座呛得不停咳嗽。她嘴边遍布红色污迹的样子，简直就像是吐过血似的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Rosa tossì violentemente. E il rosso brillante che le macchiava il volto dava l'impressione che avesse tossito sangue.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Rosa tossì violentemente. E il rosso acceso che macchiava i contorni della sua bocca, dava l'impressione che avesse vomitato sangue.
Turkish (TR): Rosa şiddetle öksürdü. Ve yüzünü boyayan parlak kırmızı renk, kan öksürmüş gibi görünmesine neden oldu.

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "You know a lot about black tea, so you should know what it means, right? "Golden drop" refers to the last drop in a drink. It is called the most precious drop in black tea."
Umineko Project (UP): "You know a lot about black tea, so you should know what it means, right? "Golden drop" refers to the last drop. It is called the most precious drop in black tea."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "You know a lot about black tea, so you should know what it means, right? 'Golden drop' refers to the last drop. It is called the most precious drop in black tea."
PC Japanese (JP): 「そなたは紅茶に詳しかろうから意味がわかろう？　ゴールデンドロップとは最後の一滴のことだ。紅茶でもっとも貴重な一滴と言われている。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そなたは紅茶に詳しかろうから意味がわかろう？　ゴールデンドロップとは最後の一滴のことだ。紅茶でもっとも貴重な一滴と言われている」
Russian (RU): "Ты ведь много знаешь о чёрном чае, тогда тебе должно быть известно, что это означает, верно? 'Золотая капля' относится к последней капле. Это считается самой ценной каплей в чёрном чае."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você sabe muito sobre chá preto, então deve saber o que isso significa, certo? "Gotas douradas" referem‐se à última gota. É como é chamada a mais preciosa gota do chá preto."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「汝很熟悉紅茶所以知道這意思吧？黃金凝液是指那最後的一滴。在紅茶中被稱為最為貴重的一滴。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「汝很熟悉红茶所以知道这意思吧？黄金凝液是指那最后的一滴。在红茶中被称为最为贵重的一滴。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Sei un'esperta di tè nero, perciò dovresti sapere cosa significa, vero? ‘Golden drop’ si riferisce all'ultima goccia. È considerata la parte più preziosa di un tè nero."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Sei molto informata sul té nero, perciò dovresti sapere a cosa mi riferisco, giusto? L'ultima goccia viene definita in quel campo come ‘{i:golden drop}’, ossia la goccia d'oro. È ritenuta la goccia più pregiata del tè nero..."
Turkish (TR): "Siyah çay hakkında çok şey biliyorsun, bu yüzden bunun ne anlama geldiğini de biliyor olmalısın, değil mi? "Altın damla" son damlayı ifade eder. Siyah çayın içindeki en değerli damla olarak bilinir."

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "......So a golden drop of blood is the same. The last and most precious drop of blood squeezed out of a human. We squeeze it using that."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........So a golden drop of blood is the same. The last and most precious drop of blood squeezed out of a human. It's squeezed with that."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「………そして血のゴールデンドロップも同じ。人間から搾り出せる血液の貴重なる最後の一滴。あれにて絞る。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………そして血のゴールデンドロップも同じ。人間から搾り出せる血液の貴重なる最後の一滴。あれにて絞る」
Russian (RU): ".........Поэтому с золотыми каплями крови то же самое. Последняя и самая дорогая капля крови выжимается из человека. Она выжимается этим."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Portanto, uma gota dourada de sangue é a mesma coisa. A última e mais preciosa gota de sangue espremida de um humano. Foi espremida com isto."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………而這血之黃金凝液，也是一樣。將能從人類身上榨出的最後一滴貴重血液，用那東西擠出來。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………而这血之黄金凝液，也是一样。将能从人类身上榨出的最后一滴贵重血液，用那东西挤出来。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Lo stesso vale per una golden drop di sangue umano. L'ultima e più preziosa goccia di sangue ricavata da un essere umano. Viene spremuta con quello."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "E lo stesso si può dire per il sangue umano. L'ultima e preziosa goccia di sangue che si può strizzare da un essere umano. La pigiamo con questo."
Turkish (TR): ".........Yani kanın altın damlası da böyledir. Bir insandan sıkılan en son ve en değerli kan damlası. İşte bununla sıkılır."

Steam (ST): As the witch snapped her fingers, a bright red veil that had been set up before something large was removed.
Umineko Project (UP): As the witch snapped her fingers, a bright red veil was pulled off something large which had not been there moments ago.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As the witch snapped her fingers, a bright red veil that had been set up before something large was removed.
PC Japanese (JP): 魔女が指を鳴らすと、いつの間にか用意されていた大きな何かに掛けられた真っ赤なベールが取り払われました。
Russian (RU): Когда ведьма щелкнула пальцами, ярко‐красная завеса, скрывавшая что‐то большое, исчезла.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ao estalar seus dedo, um brilhante véu vermelho foi retirado de algo muito grande, que até momentos atrás não estava lá.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 魔女打了個響指，不知何時備好的巨大物體，被揭開了披在上面的紅色幕布。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 魔女打了个响指，不知何时备好的巨大物体，被揭开了披在上面的红色幕布。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando la strega schioccò le dita, un velo rosso vivo che era stato posto dinnanzi a qualcosa di largo fu rimosso.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Allo schioccare di dita della strega, venne rimosso un velo rossastro che avvolgeva qualcosa di grosso, che fu allestito lì in men che non si dica...
Turkish (TR): Cadı parmaklarını şıklattığında, bir saniye önce orada olmayan büyük bir şeyin üzerindeki parlak kırmızı örtü açıldı.

Steam (ST): ...The solemn and massive machine there was just like... a coffin for a large-sized person, with many large bulb-like things stuck to it, and it looked like a sinister torture device.
Umineko Project (UP): ......The solemn and massive machine there was just like...a coffin for a large‐sized person, with many large bulb‐like things stuck to it, and it looked like a sinister torture device.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......The solemn and massive machine there was just like a coffin for a large-sized person, with many large bulb-like things stuck to it, and it looked like a sinister torture device.
PC Japanese (JP): ……そこにあった大型の厳しい機械はまるで大きな人型棺桶にいくつかの大きなバルブのようなものを取り付け、拷問道具のように厳しくしたもの。
Russian (RU): ......Мрачная и массивная машина, оказавшаяся под ней, напоминала гроб для крупного человека с прикрепленным к нему большим количеством лукообразных штуковин, и походила на зловещее пыточное устройство.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......A solene e massiva máquina era como...um caixão do tamanho de uma pessoa, como muitos do que pareciam ser bulbos presos a ela, e aparentava ser um sinistro dispositivo de tortura.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……擺在那處的大型機械簡直就像是巨大人形棺材外加裝了好幾個巨大閥門的，殘酷的拷問刑具。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……摆在那处的大型机械简直就像是巨大人形棺材外加装了好几个巨大阀门的，残酷的拷问刑具。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Il solenne e massiccio apparecchio che comparve assomigliava proprio ad una bara per una persona di statura notevole a cui erano stati attaccati vari aggeggi di grosse dimensioni simili a valvole, e sembrava un sinistro strumento di tortura.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Il massiccio e imperioso macchinario era identico... ad una grossa bara a misura d'uomo, a cui erano stati apposti diversi enormi arnesi simili a delle valvole,{n}e ricordava un minaccioso strumento di tortura.
Turkish (TR): ......Orada duran heybetli ve devasa makine tıpkı...iri yapılı biri için yapılmış bir tabuta benziyordu, üzerine çok sayıda büyük ampul benzeri şey takılmıştı, ve şeytani bir işkence aletini andırıyordu.

Steam (ST): By its unnerving shape, she could tell that with a human's strength, it could be used to tighten and compress something.
Umineko Project (UP): By its unnerving shape, you could tell that it used manpower to tighten and compress something.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): By its unnerving shape, she could tell that with a human's strength, it could tighten and compress something.
PC Japanese (JP): 人力で何かを締め付け、圧搾するのであろうことがわかる、不気味な形状をしていました。
Russian (RU): Глядя на её пугающую форму, Роза поняла, что данное устройство, приводимое в действие ручной силой, призвано что‐то стягивать и сжимать.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por sua enervante forma, você poderia dizer que ele necessitava do uso de mão de obra para apertar e comprimir as coisas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那令人毛骨竦然的形狀一看就讓人想到了，此乃以人力來轉緊什麼，並壓榨裡面之物的器具。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那令人毛骨竦然的形状一看就让人想到了，此乃以人力来转紧什么，并压榨里面之物的器具。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Osservandone la forma snervante, Rosa poteva immaginare che con la forza di una persona, l'apparecchio poteva stringere e comprimere qualcosa.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Dalla sua forma raccapricciante, si poteva intuire che venisse azionata manualmente per schiacciare e comprimere...
Turkish (TR): Rahatsız edici şeklinden, bir şeyi sıkmak ve sıkıştırmak için insan gücü kullanıldığı anlaşılıyordu.

Steam (ST): ...And it seemed that there were still some squeezed dregs remaining, ...because of the bright red remains that stained it.
Umineko Project (UP): ...And it seemed that there were still some squeezed dregs remaining inside, because of the bright red remains that stained it.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...And it seemed that there were still some squeezed dregs remaining, ...because of the bright red remains that stained it.
PC Japanese (JP): …そして、その中にはまだ搾りかすが残っているらしいことが、真っ赤に汚れた残滓でわかりました。
Russian (RU): ...И казалось, что в нём ещё осталось немного сжимаемого содержимого... потому что на нём виднелись яркие красные пятна.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...E parece que ainda havia um pouco a ser espremido pelo que havia restado lá dentro, por causa do vermelho reluzente que permanecia manchado nele.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …然後，那被染成紅色的殘渣，讓人知道了裡面還留著榨剩下的渣子。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …然后，那被染成红色的残渣，让人知道了里面还留着榨剩下的渣子。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... E pareva che vi fossero rimasti dei residui di ciò che era stato schiacciato... perché la macchina era macchiata di rosso vivo.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): E a quanto pareva, dai resti imbrattati di rosso vivo, c'erano ancora dei rimasugli al suo interno.
Turkish (TR): ...Ve üzerindeki parlak kırmızı lekeler nedeniyle, içinde hâlâ sıkılmış kalıntılar kalmış gibi görünüyordu.

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "But you can't take more than one golden drop at once. No matter what kind of human you take it from, you can't get more than one drop. But I am a witch. Reviving a person is easy for me."
Umineko Project (UP): "But you can't take more than one golden drop at once. No matter what kind of human you take it from, you can't get more than one drop. But I am a witch. It is also easy to revive a person."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「しかしゴールデンドロップは一度に一滴しか取れぬ。どんな人間からも一滴以上は取れぬというわけだ。しかし妾は魔女。人を蘇らせることもまた容易い。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「しかしゴールデンドロップは一度に一滴しか取れぬ。どんな人間からも一滴以上は取れぬというわけだ。しかし妾は魔女。人を蘇らせることもまた容易い」
Russian (RU): "Но ты не можешь получить больше чем одну каплю за раз. Независимо от того, от какого человека ты её получишь, ты не сможешь получить больше, чем одну каплю. Но я ведьма. Так же оживить человека очень легко."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Mas você não pode obter mais do que uma gota dourada por vez. Não importa que tipo de humano você use, não vai conseguir mais do que uma gota. Mas eu sou uma bruxa. É bem fácil reviver uma pessoa."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不過黃金凝液一次只能取一滴。也就是說，無論什麼樣的人類，都無法從他身上取到第二滴。但是妾身是魔女。復活人類亦是輕而易舉。」

Turkish (TR): "Ama altın damladan tek seferde birden fazla alamıyorsun. Hangi insandan alırsan al, bir damladan fazlasını alamazsın. Ama ben bir cadıyım. Bir insanı canlandırmak da çok kolay."

Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Do you understand how precious a golden drop is? To have it stained this crimson requires that several dozen people's worth be squeezed."

Umineko Project (UP): "That's right, remember that taste. Remember the taste of the tears that you spilled until you were dry. I believe this aperitif will be sufficient to heal that regrettable memory. *cackle*cackle*!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「そうそう、あの味を思い出せ。零し尽くして涸れ果てた涙の味を思い出せ。その悔しき思い出を癒して足りるアペリティフであると信じている。くっくっくっくッ！！」
Russian (RU): "Правильно, вспоминай тот вкус. Вспоминай вкус слёз, проливаемых тобой, пока они не иссякли. Полагаю, данного аперитива вполне хватит, чтобы освободиться от того горького воспоминания. *Хихи*хихи*!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Isso mesmo, relembre aquele sabor. Lembre‐se do sabor das lágrimas que você chorou até secar. Eu acredito que este aperitivo será suficiente para curar essa lamentável memória. *gargalhada*gargalhada*!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「對對，想起那股滋味來。想起那流盡了枯竭了的，眼淚的滋味來。妾身確信，這餐前酒定能十足地治癒汝那懊惱的回憶。呵呵呵呵！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「对对，想起那股滋味来。想起那流尽了枯竭了的，眼泪的滋味来。妾身确信，这餐前酒定能十足地治愈汝那懊恼的回忆。呵呵呵呵！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Bene bene, ricorda quel sapore. Ricorda il sapore delle lacrime che hai versato fino a quando non ne hai avute più. Penso che questo aperitivo sarà sufficiente a farti guarire da quell'amaro ricordo. *cackle*cackle*!!"
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Sì, così, imprimi il gusto nella tua memoria. Rimembra il sapore delle lacrime che hai versato fino ad esaurirle. Credo che questo aperitivo sarà sufficiente a farti guarire da tali amari ricordi. Mhmhmhmh!!"
Turkish (TR): "Evet evet, o tadı hatırla. Kuruyana kadar döktüğün gözyaşlarının tadını hatırla. Bu aperatifin o üzücü anıyı iyileştirmek için yeterli olacağına inanıyorum. *cackle*cackle*!!"

Steam (ST): Once again, the goat head servants tilted a deep red glass against her mouth.
Umineko Project (UP): Once again, the goat‐head servants tilted the deep red glass against her mouth.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Once again, the goat head servants tilted a deep red glass against her mouth.
PC Japanese (JP): 再び山羊頭の使用人が真っ赤なグラスを口元に傾けてきます。
Russian (RU): И вновь козлоголовые слуги наклонили глубокий красный бокал к её рту.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mais uma vez, os servos com cabeça de cabra, inclinaram o copo de vermelho profundo contra a boca dela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 山羊頭傭人再次將紅色的玻璃杯湊近樓座嘴角。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 山羊头佣人再次将红色的玻璃杯凑近楼座嘴角。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): I servi caproni inclinarono nuovamente un bicchiere rosso scuro contro la sua bocca.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): I servitori dalla testa di capra inclinarono nuovamente il bicchiere rosso acceso verso la sua bocca...
Turkish (TR): Keçi kafalı hizmetkârlar koyu kırmızı kadehi bir kez daha Rosa'nın ağzına doğru eğdi.

Steam (ST): ...Rosa tried resisting by closing her lips, but the deep red liquid was relentlessly poured into her mouth, which hung open with shock, and the inside of her mouth was filled with a ghastly sweetness...
Umineko Project (UP): ...Rosa attempted to close her lips in resistance, but the deep red liquid was relentlessly poured into her mouth, which was hanging open with shock, and the inside of her mouth was filled with a ghastly sweetness...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...Rosa tried resisting by closing her lips, but the deep red liquid was relentlessly poured into her mouth, which was hanging open with shock, and the inside of her mouth was filled with a ghastly sweetness...
PC Japanese (JP): …楼座は唇を閉じようと抵抗を試みますが、呆けるように開いた口に、その真っ赤な液体は容赦なく注ぎ込まれ、口の中を不気味な甘みで満たしていくのです…。
Russian (RU): ...Роза пыталась сопротивляться, сжав губы, но от испытанного шока рот её распахнулся и в него тотчас же безжалостно влили тёмно‐красную жидкость, заставив Розу ощутить её жуткую сладость...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Rosa tentou resistir fechando seus lábios, mas o líquido de vermelho profundo foi lentamente sendo despejado em sua boca, aberta pelo choque, e seu interior foi preenchido por uma horrível doçura...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …樓座雖然想要緊閉起嘴唇嘗試抵抗，但那發傻了似的張開的嘴巴，被毫不留情地倒進了那紅色的液體，口中布滿了滲人的甜味…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …楼座虽然想要紧闭起嘴唇尝试抵抗，但那发傻了似的张开的嘴巴，被毫不留情地倒进了那红色的液体，口中布满了渗人的甜味…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Rosa cercò di resistere chiudendo le labbra, ma il liquido rosso scuro venne riversato con ostinazione nella sua bocca, che era rimasta aperta dallo shock, e fu riempita da una dolcezza oscena...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Rosa tentò di opporre resistenza chiudendo le labbra, ma il liquido rossastro venne riversato senza tregua nella sua bocca, rimasta aperta per lo sconcerto, e che venne inondata da una dolcezza angosciante...
Turkish (TR): ...Rosa direnerek dudaklarını kapatmaya çalıştı, ama o koyu kırmızı sıvı, şoktan ağzı açık kalan Rosa'nın ağzına acımasızca döküldü, ve ağzının içi dehşet verici bir tatlılıkla doldu...

Steam (ST): It definitely was a fragrant sweetness.
Umineko Project (UP): It was definitely a fragrant sweetness.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was definitely a fragrant sweetness.
PC Japanese (JP): それは間違いなく芳香のある甘み。
Russian (RU): Это действительно был вкус ароматной сладости.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era definitivamente uma perfumada doçura.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這毫無疑問是帶有芳香的甘甜。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这毫无疑问是带有芳香的甘甜。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era indubbiamente una dolcezza fragrante.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Era senza ombra di dubbio una dolcezza ricca di aroma.
Turkish (TR): Bu kesinlikle hoş aromalı bir tatlılıktı.

Steam (ST): The living blood of her brother, who had given her such hateful thoughts and made her soak her pillow so many times, had been collected from his death, repeated dozens of times. How could the crimson-stained wine not be sweet?
Umineko Project (UP): Her brother, who she had thought of so hatefully, and who had made her soak her pillow so many times, had died dozens of times over to tinge this wine crimson, so it must have tasted sweet.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The living blood of her brother, who had given her such hateful thoughts and made her soak her pillow so many times, had been collected from his death, repeated dozens of times. It wasn't as though the crimson-stained wine wasn't sweet.
PC Japanese (JP): あれほど憎く思い枕を何度も濡らした兄の生き血を、何十も繰り返した死で集めた紅みで染めたワインが、甘くないわけがありません。
Russian (RU): Её брат, доводивший её до столь злых мыслей, из‐за которого она не раз плакала в подушку, умер несколько десятков раз, чтобы окрасить тёмно‐красным вино, получившееся действительно сладким.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Seu irmão, a quem ela pensou ter um profundo ódio, e que a fez encharcar seu travesseiro com lágrimas tantas vezes, havia morrido dezenas de vezes para tingir esse vinho carmesim, por isso ele deve ter um sabor muito adocicado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 把那可恨到多次以淚水沾濕枕頭的哥哥，通過反反覆覆殺幾十次而聚集起來的血染紅的葡萄酒，沒可能會不甜。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 把那可恨到多次以泪水沾湿枕头的哥哥，通过反反复复杀几十次而聚集起来的血染红的葡萄酒，没可能会不甜。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il sangue vivo di suo fratello, che le aveva provocato pensieri tanto carichi d'odio e che le aveva fatto inzuppare il cuscino di lacrime così tante volte, era stato raccolto con la sua morte, ripetutasi decine e decine di volte. Non che il vino macchiato di cremisi non fosse dolce.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Il sangue vivo di suo fratello, che odiava così tanto e che le aveva fatto inzuppare il cuscino di lacrime per così tante volte, era stato raccolto con la sua morte, ripetutasi decine e decine di volte, creando un vino tinto di cremisi che non poteva che avere quel dolce sapore.
Turkish (TR): Nefretle andığı ve onu defalarca yastığına gömmek zorunda bırakan ağabeyi, bu şarabı kızıla boyamak için onlarca kez ölmüştü, bu yüzden de tadı tatlı olmalıydı.

Steam (ST): But Rosa tried to spit it out.
Umineko Project (UP): But Rosa tried to spit it out.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But Rosa tried to spit it out.
PC Japanese (JP): でも、楼座は吐き出そうとしました。
Russian (RU): Но Роза пыталась выплюнуть его.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas Rosa tentou cuspi‐lo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，樓座卻想把它吐出來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，楼座却想把它吐出来。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma Rosa cercava comunque di sputarlo fuori.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ma Rosa cercò comunque di sputarlo fuori.
Turkish (TR): Ama Rosa tükürmeye çalıştı.

Steam (ST): Because of that, the deep red wine that spilled out of Rosa's mouth looked just like a bloodstain.
Umineko Project (UP): Because of that, the deep red wine that spilled out of Rosa's mouth made her look as if she was covered in blood.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Because of that, the deep red wine that spilled out of Rosa's mouth looked just like a bloodstain.
PC Japanese (JP): そのせいで、楼座は口から溢れた真っ赤なワインでまるで血塗れのように見えました。
Russian (RU): Из‐за этого вино тёмного красного цвета, пролившееся изо рта Розы, выглядело как кровавое пятно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por causa disso, o vinho de vermelho profundo que foi expelido de sua boca fez com que parecesse que ela estava coberta por sangue.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 因此，從樓座嘴角溢出的紅色葡萄酒看起來簡直就像是一片血污。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 因此，从楼座嘴角溢出的红色葡萄酒看起来简直就像是一片血污。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Così facendo, il vino rosso scuro che fuoriusciva dalla bocca di Rosa sembrava una macchia di sangue.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): A causa di ciò, il vino rosso vivo che fuoriusciva dalla bocca di Rosa sembrava una chiazza di sangue...
Turkish (TR): Bu nedenle Rosa'nın ağzından dökülen koyu kırmızı şarap onu kana bulanmış gibi gösteriyordu.

Steam (ST): ...Now that she knew that this ghastly substance wasn't a simple aperitif, Rosa couldn't help but feel uncomfortable about what would happen if this banquet continued.
Umineko Project (UP): ......If this ghastly substance was only the aperitif, Rosa couldn't help but feel uncomfortable about what would happen if this banquet continued.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Now that she knew that this ghastly substance wasn't a simple aperitif, Rosa couldn't help but feel uncomfortable about what would happen if this banquet continued.
PC Japanese (JP): ……このような不気味なるものが単なるアペリティフである以上、楼座はこの後に続くだろう宴に不安を覚えないわけもありませんでした。
Russian (RU): ......Теперь, когда она знала, что это страшное вещество было не просто аперитивом, Розе становилось не по себе при мысли, что произойдет дальше, если этот пир продолжится.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Se essa horrível substância era apenas o aperitivo, Rosa não pôde fazer nada além de se sentir desconfortável sobre o que iria acontecer se o banquete continuasse.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……如此恐怖的東西才只是餐前酒，樓座當然不可能不為還要繼續下去的宴會，而感到不安。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……如此恐怖的东西才只是餐前酒，楼座当然不可能不为还要继续下去的宴会，而感到不安。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ora che sapeva che questa sostanza sinistra non era un semplice aperitivo, Rosa non poteva fare a meno di provare ansia pensando a cosa sarebbe successo se questo banchetto fosse continuato.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Se quella sostanza sinistra era un semplice aperitivo, Rosa non riusciva a non provare ansia al pensiero di come sarebbe proseguito il banchetto.
Turkish (TR): ......Eğer bu tüyler ürpertici madde sadece bir aperatifse, Rosa bu ziyafetin devam etmesi halinde olacaklardan duyduğu tedirginliği hissetmekten kendini alamıyordu.

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "That is a double-tongued salad made from vegetables in season. ...On your 9th birthday, you made a wish that you'd someday get to chew this to bits, this salad made from Eva's tongue."
Umineko Project (UP): "That is a forked‐tongued salad made from vegetables in season. ...On your ninth birthday, you wished you could bite it off someday—so here is that salad you desired, made from Eva's tongue."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "That is a double-tongued salad made from vegetables in season. ...As you hoped you could one day chew to bits on your 9th birthday, here is that salad you desired, made from Eva's tongue."
PC Japanese (JP): 「それは旬の野菜による二枚舌のサラダ風だ。…お前がいつか食い千切ってやりたいと９歳の誕生日の日に願った、絵羽の舌で作った念願のサラダよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「それは旬の野菜による二枚舌のサラダ風だ。…お前がいつか食い千切ってやりたいと９歳の誕生日の日に願った、絵羽の舌で作った念願のサラダよ」
Russian (RU): "Это салат из лживых языков с овощами. ...Ты же мечтала, что на свой девятый день рождения сможешь отведать этого салата, приготовленного из языка Евы."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Essa é uma salada de língua bifurcada feita com vegetais da estação. ...Em seu nono aniversário, você desejou que pudesse prová‐la um dia — então aqui está a salada que você desejou, feita com língua de Eva."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「這是由當季蔬菜搭配做成的{c:86EF9C:二枚舌}沙拉。{c:86EF9C:（詳見魔導書“日文知識相關”條目）}…這是實現了你九歲生日時許下的，總有一天要咬碎繪羽的願望的，由她的舌頭做成的沙拉喲。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这是由当季蔬菜搭配做成的{c:86EF9C:二枚舌}沙拉。{c:86EF9C:（详见魔导书“日文知识相关”条目）}…这是实现了你九岁生日时许下的，总有一天要咬碎绘羽的愿望的，由她的舌头做成的沙拉哟。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Quella è un'insalata di lingue fatta con ortaggi di stagione. ... Proprio come quella che al tuo nono compleanno avevi sperato di poter masticare un giorno, ecco l'insalata che avevi desiderato, fatta con la lingua di Eva."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Questa è un'insalata di lingue biforcute, realizzata con verdure di stagione... Ecco l'insalata dei tuoi sogni, creata con le lingue di Eva, le stesse lingue che, il giorno del tuo nono compleanno, avevi desiderato di poter prima o poi strappare a morsi."
Turkish (TR): "Bu ise, mevsim sebzelerinden yapılmış bir dil salatası. ...Dokuzuncu yaş gününde bir gün ısırıp koparabilmeyi dilediğin Eva'nın dilinden yapılmış—işte o çok istediğin—salata."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Russian (RU): [=OG]
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): [=ITA]
Turkish (TR): [=UP]

Steam (ST): When Rosa heard the true nature of the pink-colored meat piled up in the salad, she had a sudden impulse to vomit her guts out.
Umineko Project (UP): When Rosa heard the true nature of the pink‐colored meat piled up in the salad, she had a sudden impulse to vomit her guts out.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When Rosa heard the true nature of the pink-colored meat piled up in the salad, she had a sudden impulse to vomit her guts out.
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座は、サラダに盛り付けられている桃色の肉の正体を聞き、内臓を口から全て吐き出してしまいたい衝動に駆られます。
Russian (RU): Когда Роза узнала настоящую природы розоватого мяса, приправленного салатом, у неё возник внезапный порыв к опорожнению своего желудка.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando Rosa ouviu sobre a verdadeira natureza da carne rosada que estava sobre a salada, ela teve um impulso repentino de querer vomitar suas entranhas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 樓座一聽到這盛在沙拉上的粉肉的原料，腦中就涌起股想要把內臟全都從口中吐出來的衝動。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 楼座一听到这盛在沙拉上的粉肉的原料，脑中就涌起股想要把内脏全都从口中吐出来的冲动。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando sentì della vera natura della carne rosea nell'insalata, Rosa avvertì l'impulso improvviso di vomitare tutto quello che aveva dentro.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Quando udì la vera natura della carne rosea disposta sull'insalata, Rosa venne sconvolta dall'impulso di vomitare fuori tutto quello che aveva nello stomaco...
Turkish (TR): Rosa salatanın içindeki pembe renkli etlerin gerçek içeriğini öğrendiğinde, ani bir içgüdüyle adeta bağırsaklarını kusmak istedi.

Steam (ST): ...Furthermore, the goat servants stuck a fork in it...and carried it to Rosa's mouth.
Umineko Project (UP): ...Furthermore, the goat servants stuck a fork in it, and carried it to Rosa's mouth.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …しかも、山羊の使用人はそれをフォークで刺し、楼座の口元へ運ぶのです。
Russian (RU): ...Кроме того, козлоголовые слуги нанизали его на вилку и поднесли ко рту Розы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Além disso, os servos com cabeça de cabra fincaram um garfo, e a levaram até a boca de Rosa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …可是，山羊傭人卻用叉子叉起這個，直往樓座嘴裡送。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …可是，山羊佣人却用叉子叉起这个，直往楼座嘴里送。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Inoltre, i servi dalle teste di caproni ne presero un pezzo con la forchetta e lo portarono alla bocca di Rosa.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): E per giunta, un servitore dalla testa caprina ne infilzò un pezzo con la forchetta... e lo portò alle sue labbra.
Turkish (TR): ...Dahası, keçi uşakları bir çatal saplayarak Rosa'nın ağzına götürdüler.

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "How does your double-tongued sister taste? It must be quite soft and enchanting, right? *cackle*cackle*!"
Umineko Project (UP): "How does your sister's forked tongue taste? It must be quite soft and enchanting, right? *cackle*cackle*!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "How does your double-tongued sister taste? It must be quite soft and enchanting, right? *cackle*cackle*!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「姉の二枚舌のお味はどうか？　さぞや柔らかくとろけるであろう？　くっくっくっく！」
Russian (RU): "Как твоя лживая сестра на вкус? Должно быть весьма мягко и завораживающе, верно? *хихи*хихи*!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Como é o sabor da língua bifurcada da sua irmã? Deve ser bem macia e encantadora, certo? *gargalhada*gargalhada*!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「姐姐的二枚舌的滋味如何呀？想必是既鬆軟又入口即化吧？呵呵呵呵！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「姐姐的二枚舌的滋味如何呀？想必是既松软又入口即化吧？呵呵呵呵！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Com'è il sapore della tua ipocrita sorella? Deve essere davvero morbido e accattivante, ho ragione? *cackle*cackle*!"
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Che sapore ha la lingua biforcuta di tua sorella? Sono certa che è soffice e intrigante, vero? Kuahahahah!"
Turkish (TR): "Kız kardeşinin çatallı dilinin tadı nasıl? Oldukça yumuşak ve büyüleyici olmalı, değil mi? *cackle*cackle*!"

Steam (ST): It probably would be quite sweet, soft and enchanting in her mouth.
Umineko Project (UP): How sweet, soft and enchanting it must have tasted in her mouth.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maybe it was quite sweet, soft and enchanting in her mouth.
PC Japanese (JP): それはさぞや口の中で甘く柔らかくとろけるでしょう。
Russian (RU): Возможно, во рту он был сладким, мягким и чарующим.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quão doce, macia e encantadora deve ser o gosto em sua boca.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這在口中定是既鬆軟又入口即化吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这在口中定是既松软又入口即化吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Forse era veramente dolce, morbido e accattivante per il suo palato.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Sicuramente, dentro il suo palato sentiva qualcosa di dolce, soffice e intrigante.
Turkish (TR): Ağzında nasıl da tatlı, yumuşak ve büyüleyici bir tadı olmalı.

Steam (ST): After all, Eva's lies were always sweet, and young Rosa had always listened to them.
Umineko Project (UP): After all, Eva's lies were always sweet, and young Rosa had always listened to them.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After all, Eva's lies were always sweet, and young Rosa had always listened to them.
PC Japanese (JP): だって、絵羽の嘘はいつも甘く、幼い楼座はいつもそれに耳を貸してしまったのですから。
Russian (RU): В конце концов, ложь Евы всегда была сладкой и молодая Роза всегда слушала её.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Afinal, as mentiras de Eva sempre foram doces, e a jovem Rosa sempre as ouvia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 因為，繪羽的謊言總是那麼甘甜鬆軟，小時候的樓座總是不由自主地去聽信。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 因为，绘羽的谎言总是那么甘甜松软，小时候的楼座总是不由自主地去听信。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopotutto, le menzogne di Eva erano sempre state dolci, e la giovane Rosa le aveva sempre ascoltate.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Dopotutto, le bugie di Eva erano ogni volta dolci come il miele, e la giovane Rosa finiva sempre a darle retta...
Turkish (TR): Ne de olsa Eva'nın yalanları hep tatlıydı ve genç Rosa onları hep dinlemişti.

Steam (ST): ...And, you might say the stimulating pepper seasoning expressed the truth behind those lies well.
Umineko Project (UP): ...So you could say that the taste of the stimulating pepper seasoning that had been added expressed the details of those lies well.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...So you could say that the taste of the stimulating pepper seasoning that was added expressed the details of those lies well.
PC Japanese (JP): …だからピリリと胡椒で刺激的に味付けがしてあるのは、その嘘の顛末をよく味で表現していると言えました。
Russian (RU): ...Таким образом, можно было сказать, что вкус добавленной перечной приправы отлично подчёркивал ту ложь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...E você até poderia dizer que o sabor do estimulante tempero de pimenta adicionado, expressou as verdades por trás de suas mentiras também.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …所以，這讓舌頭發麻的，用胡椒做成的刺激性調味料，可以說是漂亮地以味道表現出了這種謊言引發的始末。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …所以，这让舌头发麻的，用胡椒做成的刺激性调味料，可以说是漂亮地以味道表现出了这种谎言引发的始末。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Per questo motivo si sarebbe potuto dire che lo stuzzicante condimento a base di pepe che vi era stato aggiunto simboleggiava perfettamente i dettagli di quelle bugie.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Per cui, si poteva dire che il sapore del condimento, sfizioso, pungente e a base di pepe, fosse un'ottima metafora culinaria dei particolari delle sue menzogne.
Turkish (TR): ...Bu yüzden, eklenen canlandırıcı biber çeşnisinin tadının bu yalanların ayrıntılarını daha iyi ifade ettiği söylenebilirdi.

Steam (ST): As the tongue salad that kept being pushed into Rosa's mouth was covered with saliva, she spat it out.
Umineko Project (UP): Rosa spat out the tongue salad that kept being pushed into her mouth, covering it with saliva.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As the tongue salad that kept being pushed into Rosa's mouth was covered with saliva, she spat it out.
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座は口に次々と押し込まれる舌サラダをぼろぼろと唾液塗れにしながら吐き出します。
Russian (RU): Поскольку салат с языком, который всё ещё продолжал заталкиваться в рот Розы, был покрыт слюной, она выплюнула его.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rosa cuspiu fora a salada de língua que continuava a ser empurrada contra sua boca, cobrindo ela com saliva.

Steam (ST): But the goat head servants carefully returned it to the plate and carried it to Rosa's mouth over and over again.
Umineko Project (UP): But the goat‐head servants carefully returned it to the plate and carried it to Rosa's mouth over and over again.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But the goat head servants carefully returned it to the plate and carried it to Rosa's mouth over and over again.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし山羊頭の使用人はそれを丁寧に皿に戻しては何度でも楼座の口に運ぶのです。
Russian (RU): Но козёл, возглавлявший прислугу, возвращался к тарелке и неоднократно подносил его ко рту Розы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas os servos com cabeça de cabra cuidadosamente colocavam de volta no prato e levavam até a boca de Rosa, de novo e de novo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然而，山羊頭傭人又將此小心盛回盤子，一次又一次地往樓座口中送。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然而，山羊头佣人又将此小心盛回盘子，一次又一次地往楼座口中送。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma volta dopo volta i servi riempivano il piatto e imboccavano ancora Rosa.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ma ogni volta, i servitori dalla testa di capra li rimettevano con cura nel suo piatto, per poi riportarglieli alla sua bocca.
Turkish (TR): Ancak keçi kafalı hizmetkârlar özenle tabağa geri koyarak, tekrar ve tekrar Rosa'nın ağzına götürdüler.

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "It goes without saying, but I made this salad liberally using five of Eva's tongues. You can't get more than one tongue out of a person. But I can get them over and over. *cackle*cackle*!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "It goes without saying, but I made this salad generously using five of Eva's tongues. You can't steal more than one tongue out of one person. But I can steal it over and over. *cackle*cackle*!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "It goes without saying, but I made this salad liberally using five of Eva's tongues. You can't steal more than one out of one tongue. But I can steal it over and over. *cackle*cackle*!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「言うに及ばず、そのサラダには絵羽の舌を５枚も惜しげなく使っている。舌はひとりから１枚しか奪えぬ。しかし妾なら、何度でも奪える。くっくっくっく！！」
Russian (RU): "Само собой разумеется, но я приготовила этот салат, используя пять языков Евы. Ты не можешь забрать больше чем один язык. Но я могу набрать их снова и снова. *хихи*хихи*!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É evidente, mas eu fiz essa salada generosamente usando cinco línguas da Eva. Você não pode pegar mais do que uma língua de cada pessoa. Porém, eu posso pegá‐la de novo e de novo. *gargalhada*gargalhada*!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「都不用說，這沙拉不惜用了繪羽的五片舌頭。舌頭只能從一個人身上奪去一片。可是妾身，卻是能奪無數次。呵呵呵呵！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「都不用说，这沙拉不惜用了绘羽的五片舌头。舌头只能从一个人身上夺去一片。可是妾身，却是能夺无数次。呵呵呵呵！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non ci sarebbe bisogno di dirlo, ma ho preparato quest'insalata usando tranquillamente cinque lingue di Eva. Da una sola lingua non puoi ricavarne di più. Ma io posso prendere la stessa lingua più e più volte. *cackle*cackle*!!"
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Inutile dire che ho usato ben cinque lingue di Eva per preparare quest'insalata. Non si può privare ad una persona più di una lingua. Ma io posso privarla più e più volte. Mhmhmhmh!!"
Turkish (TR): "Söylemeye gerek yok ama bu salatayı Eva'nın dillerinden beş tanesini kullanarak cömertçe yaptım. Bir insandan birden fazla dil çalamazsın. Ama ben tekrar ve tekrar çalabilirim. *cackle*cackle*!!"

Steam (ST): As Rosa's tears dripped down, she resisted frantically. However, the only way she could resist was by refusing to swallow.
Umineko Project (UP): As Rosa's tears dripped down, she resisted, half‐crazed.{n}However, the only way she could resist was by refusing to swallow.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As Rosa's tears dripped down, she resisted, half-crazed. However, the only way she could resist was by refusing to swallow.
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座は涙を零しながら、半狂乱になって抵抗します。しかし、できる抵抗は嚥下を拒否することだけなのです。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 楼座は涙を零しながら、錯乱状態になって抵抗します。{n}しかし、できる抵抗は嚥下を拒否することだけなのです。
Russian (RU): По лицу Розы текли слёзы, доведённая до полубезумия, она сопротивлялась.{n}Однако единственное, что она могла противопоставить этому, был отказ глотать.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As lágrimas de Rosa escorriam enquanto ela tentava resistir freneticamente.{n}No entanto, a única forma de resistência era se recusar a engolir.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 樓座邊落下淚水，邊發狂似的抵抗著。{n}可是，能做到的抵抗，僅是拒絕咽下而已。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 楼座边落下泪水，边发狂似的抵抗着。{n}可是，能做到的抵抗，仅是拒绝咽下而已。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Mentre le lacrime di Rosa scorrevano, lei resisteva, quasi impazzita. Tuttavia, l'unico modo in cui potesse resistere era rifiutarsi di ingoiare.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Con le lacrime che scorrevano sul suo volto, Rosa opponeva una resistenza forsennata. Tuttavia, l'unico modo con cui poteva opporsi era di rifiutarsi di inghiottire.
Turkish (TR): Rosa'nın gözyaşları süzülürken, yarı çılgın bir halde direniyordu.{n}Ancak, karşı koyabilmesinin tek yolu yutkunmayı reddetmekti.

Steam (ST): Even if she didn't swallow it, the taste of the french dressing increasingly permeated Rosa's mouth...
Umineko Project (UP): Even if she didn't swallow it, the taste of the french dressing increasingly violated Rosa's mouth...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even if she didn't swallow it, the taste of the french dressing increasingly violated Rosa's mouth...
PC Japanese (JP): たとえ飲み込まなくても、口の中に広がるフレンチドレッシングの味が、楼座の口中をますますに冒していきます…。
Russian (RU): Даже если она и не глотала, вкус французской приправы ещё больше обжигал рот Розы...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo que ela não engolisse, o sabor do molho french aumentava conforme permeava a boca de Rosa...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 即使沒有吞下，那在口中展開的法式色拉調味汁的味道，仍逐步擴大著在樓座口中的領地…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 即使没有吞下，那在口中展开的法式色拉调味汁的味道，仍逐步扩大着在楼座口中的领地…。

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): E anche se non ingoiava, il sapore della vinaigrette asfissiava sempre di più la bocca di Rosa...
Turkish (TR): Yutmasa bile, Fransız sosunun tadı Rosa'nın ağzını giderek daha fazla dolduruyordu...

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "Does it not please you...? There's lots more. Sea bass pie wrapped in the skin of Rudolf's face. Soup with boiled brains, liver pate. And look forward to dessert, *cackle*cackle*!!
Umineko Project (UP): "Is it not to your satisfaction...? There's still much more food. Sea bass pie wrapped in the skin of Rudolf's face. Soup with boiled brains, liver pate. And look forward to dessert, *cackle*cackle*!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Does it please you...? There's still much more food. Sea bass pie wrapped in the skin of Rudolf's face. Soup with boiled brains, liver pate. And look forward to dessert, *cackle*cackle*!!
PC Japanese (JP): 「お気に召さぬか…？　まだまだ料理は続くぞ。留弗夫の顔の皮で包んだスズキのパイ。脳みそを茹でたスープに、肝臓のフォワグラ。デザートにも期待せよ、くっくっくっく！！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「お気に召さぬか…？　まだまだ料理は続くぞ。留弗夫の顔の皮で包んだスズキのパイ。脳みそを茹でたスープに、肝臓のフォワグラ。デザートにも期待せよ、くっくっくっく！！」
Russian (RU): "Тебе нравится? Здесь ещё много еды. Пирог из морского окуня, завернутый в кожу с лица Рудольфа. Суп из отварного мозга, паштет из печени. И с нетерпением ожидай десерта, *хихи*хихи*!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não está ao seu agrado...? Ainda há muitos pratos para experimentar. Torta de badejo do mar envolta pela pele do rosto do Rudolf. Sopa com cérebros fervidos, patê de fígado. E ainda temos as sobremesas, *gargalhada*gargalhada*!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不合汝意嗎…？料理還會接著上哦。用留弗夫的面皮包成的鱸魚派。用腦漿煮成的濃湯，還有肥人肝。甜點也敬請期待吧，呵呵呵呵！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不合汝意吗…？料理还会接着上哦。用留弗夫的面皮包成的鲈鱼派。用脑浆煮成的浓汤，还有肥人肝。甜点也敬请期待吧，呵呵呵呵！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "È di tuo gradimento...? C'è ancora tanto cibo. Pasticcio di branzino avvolto nella pelle del viso di Rudolf. Zuppa con cervella bollite, paté di fegato. {n}E aspettati grandi cose dal dessert, *cackle*cackle*!!
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "È di tuo gradimento...? Rimane ancora tanto cibo. Pasticcio di branzino avvolto nella pelle del viso di Rudolf. Zuppa di cervella bollite, foie gras con fegato umano. E tieniti pronta per il dessert, mhmhmhmh!!"
Turkish (TR): "Seni tatmin etmiyor mu...? Daha yiyecek çok şey var. Rudolf'un yüzünün derisiyle sarılmış levrekli turta. Haşlanmış beyin çorbası, ciğer ezmesi. Ve tatlıyı da dört gözle bekle, *cackle*cackle*!!"

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): It's not just your siblings, see? I have lavishly assembled all of those whom you have trusted and yet by whom you were betrayed. Why don't we continue this banquet for all eternity, until your heart is satisfied? For all eternity.
Umineko Project (UP): "It's not just your siblings, see? I have lavishly arranged all of those who you have trusted and yet betrayed you. Why don't we continue this banquet for all eternity, until your heart is satisfied. For all eternity."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It's not just your siblings, see? I have lavishly arranged all of those who you have trusted and yet betrayed you. Why don't we continue this banquet for all eternity, until your heart is satisfied. For all eternity.
PC Japanese (JP): 兄弟だけではないぞ？　お前が信頼し、にもかかわらず裏切った人間たちをふんだんに調理した。この宴を、そなたの心が満足するまで、永遠に続けようではないか。永遠に。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「兄弟だけではないぞ？　お前が信頼し、にもかかわらず裏切った人間たちをふんだんに調理した。この宴を、そなたの心が満足するまで、永遠に続けようではないか。永遠に」
Russian (RU): "Это не только твои родные братья и сестры, видишь ли. Я щедро подала к столу тех, кому ты доверяла, и всё равно тебя предали. Почему бы нам не растянуть этот пир на вечность, пока твоё сердце не удовлетворится. На целую вечность."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não são apenas os seus irmãos, sabia? Eu generosamente reuni todos aqueles que você confiava e a traíram. Por que não continuamos este banquete por toda a eternidade, até que seu coração esteja satisfeito? {i:Ad aeternum}."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不止是哥哥姐姐哦？不顧你的信任，背叛了你的人也是一併烹飪了不少哦。這場宴會，在汝的心得到滿足之前，會永遠地繼續下去。永遠地。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不止是哥哥姐姐哦？不顾你的信任，背叛了你的人也是一并烹饪了不少哦。这场宴会，在汝的心得到满足之前，会永远地继续下去。永远地。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non ci sono solo i tuoi fratelli, vedi? Ho sistemato con gran cura tutti quelli che ti hanno tradita nonostante ti fossi fidata di loro. Perché non continuiamo questo banchetto per tutta l'eternità, fino a che il tuo cuore si sentirà soddisfatto. Per tutta l'eternità.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Non ci sono solo i tuoi fratelli, sai? Mi sono data un gran daffare per cucinare tutte le persone che, a dispetto della fiducia che hai riposto in loro, ti hanno tradita. Perché non continuiamo questo banchetto per sempre, fino a quando il tuo cuore non sarà soddisfatto? Per tutta l'eternità..."
Turkish (TR): "Sadece kardeşlerin değil, biliyorsun. Güvendiğin ama yine de sana ihanet eden herkesi cömertçe hazırladım. Neden bu ziyafete sonsuza dek, kalbin tatmin olana kadar devam etmiyoruz? Sonsuza dek."

If you want to laugh, then do so, and if you won't feel better until you've heard a raw performance of your annoying older siblings' screams, I'll let you hear them as much as you like.

PC Japanese (JP): ……嬉しいィだろォ右代宮楼座ァアア？　嫌がるフリなんかするなよ本当は嬉しいってのはわかってるんだぜェ？　笑いたくば笑えばいい、ムカつく兄貴や姉貴の悲鳴の生演奏がないとご機嫌になれないってんならいくらでも聞かせてやる。

Russian (RU): "......Ты ведь рада, верно, Уширомия Ро‐оза‐а? Не притворяйся, будто ненавидишь это. Я знаю, что ты действительно счастлива, не так ли? Если ты хочешь смеяться, то можешь смеяться, если тебе не станет лучше, пока ты не услышишь живые крики своих раздражающих братьев или сестры, то я дам тебе их услышать, так часто, как ты того пожелаешь."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Você está feliz, ceeerto, Ushiromiya Rosaaaa? Não finja que você odeia isso, eu sei que você está realmente feliz, ceeerto??
